resources.string: "Enter the email of the account with the forgotten password. Instructions will be emailed your entry to reset your password.
This is the profile that will represent your business. You will be able to invite employees and manage their schedules after your profile has been set up.
You have not set up a business page yet. Click below to create a business page.
